reviewText: I did not realize that these were the uncut version my handicapped son loves the show cops so we thought this would be good for him but now he knows how to say the f word.

Geez, listen to the St Louis bleeding heart!  These cops risk their lives to protect you from gun-toting drug dealers and drive-by shooters, slobbering drunk drivers, thieves, rapists, and murderers.  Take them off the streets of YOUR city, St Louis, the crime capital of the midwest, and wait about 20 minutes to see anarchy ensue.  Think about it.
What is new about this film? Just a bunch of abusive cops bulling the slave class (the American people).  Videos like this only are used to condition the population to accept police brutality.
